name: Up down image slideshow gallery
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Up down image slideshow gallery lets showcase images in a vertical move style. Single image at a time and pull one by one continually.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/04/25/wordpress-plugin-up-down-image-slideshow-script/

  • Live Demo
  • More information
  • User Comments

Up down image slideshow gallery lets showcase images in a vertical move style. Single image at a time and pull one by one continually. This slideshow will pause on mouse over. The speed of the plugin gallery is customizable. Persistence of last viewed image supported, so when the user reloads the page, the slideshow continues from the last image.

  • Free.
  • Easy to customize.
  • Support all browser.
  • Automatically pauses on mouse over.
  • Can use many time in the same page.
  • Can stop the slideshow after some cycle.
  • Short code available for pages and posts.
  • Supports localization.

We have three option to install and configure this Up down image slideshow gallery plugin.

Translators

  • Tamil (ta) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar
sections.installation:
Method 1

File upload using ftp

Method 2

Direct upload from website admin

Method 3

Upload from website admin with ZIP file

Configuration

We have 3 option to configure this plugin click here to see more info.
sections.faq:
Q1) How to update the width, height, fade duration, pause of the gallery?

Q2) Where to upload my image?

Q3) How the slide show manages the order?

Q4) How to split the images for gallery?

Q5) Where to update the duration of transition?

Q6) Where to update the pause time between images?

More info : click to go
sections.changelog:
12.1

  1. Tested up to 6.4

12.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9

11.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

11.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

11.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

11.6

  1. Tested up to 5.4

11.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

11.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.
  3. Converted admin JS alert message into WP class file.

11.3

  1. Tested up to 4.9

11.2

  1. Tested up to 4.8

11.1

  1. Tested up to 4.7

11.0

  1. Tested up to 4.6

10.9

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

10.8

  1. Tested up to 4.4

10.7

  1. Tested up to 4.3.1
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

10.6

  1. Tested up to 4.3
  2. Image upload option is added in the plugin admin. With this option you can easily upload (or select from media) your images into this plugin.

10.5

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

10.4

  1. Tested up to 4.1

10.3

  1. Tested up to 4.0

10.2

  1. Tested up to 3.9
  2. Added some security feature

10.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (udisg.po) available in the languages folder. Translators Welcome.
  3. Supports network multisite website (Manual table creation required).

10.0

Tested up to WordPress 3.6
Added security feature.

9.2

Tested up to WordPress 3.5
Avoid registering the alternate jQuery.
From this version we are using existing wordpress jQuery.

9.1

Tested up to 3.4.2

9.0

New demo link, http://www.gopiplus.com

8.0

JavaScript loaded by using the wp_enqueue_scripts hook (instead of the init hook), This will avoid the JavaScript, Jquery conflict.
Slight change in the short code, Please find the new short code for your gallery.

7.0

Fixed plug-in directory violations issue

6.0

Tested upto 3.4

5.0

Tested upto 3.3

4.0

Small 3.0 bug fixed

3.0

Small 2.0 bug fixed

2.0

Tested UpTo WP 3.2.1
Javascript added as per W3C standard.

1.0

First version
